scripts.prisma: (cd discord-db && prisma generate) && (cd db && prisma generate)
scripts.prisma:pull: (cd discord-db && prisma db pull) && (cd db && prisma db pull)
scripts.postinstall: cat node_modules/.pnpm/aki-api*/node_modules/aki-api/dist/src/index.js | sed -e '/const fs .*/ s/^#*/\/\//' | sed -e '/const https .*/ s/^#*/\/\//' | sed -e '/https.globalAgent.options.ca.*/ s/^#*/\/\//' | tee node_modules/.pnpm/aki-api*/node_modules/aki-api/dist/src/index.js
